metadata.name: Toxic Storm
metadata.description: Welcome to Raining Hills Asylum. Home to the damned and unwanted ranks of the criminally insane. Patient X recounts his story to Doctor Susan Parsons during a psychological review. His tale is one full of betrayal, murder and black magic. A twist of fate presents Patient X a chance of freedom and escape. Stand witness to the origin and birth of one of the most original and talked about characters from recent independent comics in this supernatural thriller.
